location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to Government at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to Government at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, transmitting a copy of a letter sent to Warden by John Adam, Secretary to Governent at Fort William, on 18 February 1814, informing that the Governor reserved to himself the task, originally given to the Resident, to negotiate a treaty with the Wahabees [Wahhabis], and wished that Bruce mantain a friendly and conciliatory conduct with the Wahhabis Chief.
